name: Super Roman Conquest -  A 3D Side Scrolling Strategy Game
blurb: LucasArts veterans craft a retro side-scrolling RTS that takes place in a multi-layered, 3D world set in Ancient Rome.

rewards.reward: PLEBEIAN TIER - NAME IN CREDITS + UNIQUE FORUM TAG\r\n==============================\r\nYour name will go into the credits as a patron of SRC under your chosen reward tier. Plus, you'll receive a unique forum tag that displays your reward tier for all to see.

CIVIS ROMANUS TIER - DRM-FREE GAME COPY\r\n==============================\r\nDRM-free copy of Super Roman Conquest when it is released. There\u2019s no DRM on this bad boy whatsoever so the only thing we ask of you once you receive it is to enjoy playing it. If we end up on Steam this may be a Steam key. Includes the one lower reward tier.

TRIBUNE TIER - MEMBER OF THE VOTING SENATE +  EARLY BETA GAME ACCESS ============================== Exclusive closed BETA access, where you will play the unfinished game to give feedback.\r\nMembers of the Senate get exclusive Forum access, where they can vote on decrees that add complimentary features. Help shape additional content by interacting with us, the devs! See the SENATE DECREES section for more info. Includes all lower reward tiers.

MERCENARY TIER - NAME AS IN GAME CHARACTER\r\n==============================\r\nGive us your name and have it appear as a Mercenary within campaigns in SRC! You choose whether to give us a proper Roman name or allow us to \u201cRomanize\u201d your own name. See your chosen name in game! Other players will interact with your custom character!

MERCHANT TIER - NAME AS IN GAME CHARACTER\r\n==============================\r\nGive us your name and have it appear as a Merchant within campaigns in SRC! You choose whether to give us a proper Roman name or allow us to \u201cRomanize\u201d your own name. See your chosen name in game! Other players will interact with your custom character! Plus all lower reward tiers.

PATRICIAN TIER - DIGITAL COPY OF ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK + PDF ART BOOK\r\n==============================\r\nDigital copy of the original soundtrack with contributions from award-winning composer Jesse Harlin. Also receive a PDF art book. You think books come in paper these days? Nope, this one's all digital and shows the visual design process of Super Roman Conquest. Learn how we arrived at the finished old-school inspired look of the game. Plus all lower reward tiers.

GOVERNOR TIER - NAME AS IN GAME CHARACTER\r\n==============================\r\nGive us your name and have it appear as a Region Governor within campaigns in SRC! You choose whether to give us a proper Roman name or allow us to \u201cRomanize\u201d your own name. See your chosen name in game! Other players will interact with your custom character! Plus all lower reward tiers.

MAGISTRATE TIER - ACCESS TO CLOSED VOTING SESSIONS WITH DEVELOPERS + ALPHA GAME ACCESS\r\n==============================  Receive the earliest possible access to the game -- our ridiculously unfinished PC Alpha build! Also, you'll vote in closed elections where you will determine what features get pushed towards the Senate assembly vote. See SENATE DECREES for more info. Plus all lower reward tiers.

GLADIATOR TIER - NAME AS IN GAME CHARACTER\r\n==============================\r\nGive us your name and have it appear as a Gladiator within campaigns in SRC! You choose whether to give us a proper Roman name or allow us to \u201cRomanize\u201d your own name. Other players will interact with your custom character!

LEGATUS TIER - PHYSICAL GOODS\r\n==============================\r\nContribute at the Legatus tier and we will ship awesome prizes to your home.  You'll get a D-Lux Compact Disc of our soundtrack, classy coffee mug with our wraparound map of the Mediterranean, plus a developer-signed glossy print of a level from SRC. Plus all lower reward tiers.

PROCONSUL TIER - DEVELOPER SIGNED COPY OF THE GAME + SENATE VETO POWER + SPECIAL IN-GAME THANK YOU
==============================
Remember when games came in physical CD cases? Maybe you’ve just seen pictures. But either way donate at this tier and get a physical disc copy of Super Roman Conquest with custom cover art signed by the developers and ready for display.

Also, PROCONSUL members have VETO power over the Senate assembly. Send democratically elected decrees back to the Senate for a re-vote. Additionally, you will be honored in an in-game Tribute, featuring a statue emblazoned with your name.    Plus all lower reward tiers

QAESTOR TIER - CUSTOM SRC HOODIE AND THREE EXTRA COPIES / STEAM CODES OF THE GAME ============================== \r\nQaestor, don this custom, American Apparel hoodie for the cold nights playing Super Roman Conquest.  Also, use the gifts of extra copies (extra Steam codes when available) to truly impress the plebes.  Plus all lower reward tiers.

PRAETOR TIER - BE AN IN-GAME GENERAL
==============================
Appear as a general within Super Roman Conquest. Send us your IRL picture and we’ll create a custom sprite drawn to look like you. Don’t like the way you look, no problem! Our crack team of veteran artists will create a badass looking general named after and approved by you.

Have YOUR name and/or face gloat over the failed games of other players from now to eternity! Plus all lower reward tiers.

CONSUL TIER - DESIGN A CUSTOM EVENT\r\n==============================\r\nDesign a custom event within Super Roman Conquest. Collaborate with us devs to help create an event that all players will experience in the finished product. This could be anything from a decree from the Senate to worship your likeness all the way to a game breaking volcano eruption. It\u2019s up to you. Only obligation is to make it cool. Plus all lower reward tiers.

IMPERATOR TIER - LAUNCH PARTY + GAMING WITH THE DEVELOPERS
==============================
We’ll fly you out to San Francisco so you can attend our launch party, play board games at a developer filled board game night, and play classic LucasArts titles with the people who worked on them. Gain behind-the-scenes insights about the games you love! We want you to come to San Francisco so we can show you the city and other concepts currently in development at SeaCliff Interactive. 

Let us show you the luxurious and fast paced life of an indie developer. PM us for more info on this offer.
